name: Abrams Command
description:
In the new Abrams Command, you take control of a mighty Abrams Tank! Shoot enemies tanks to get points. The father away the enemy tank, the more points it is worth. Keep that multiplier up for the ultimate high score. Get out there Commander, and show us what you got!

In DirtAttack1 you use your special spinning green box to shoot holy yellow boxes of divine power at the evil red boxes.
